name: Disabled IE Security Features
description: Detects command lines that indicate unwanted modifications to registry keys that disable important Internet Explorer security features
false_positives: Unknown, maybe some security software installer disables these features temporarily
query: ((process.command_line:/.*\ \-[Nn][Aa][Mm][Ee]\ [Ii][Ee][Hh][Aa][Rr][Dd][Ee][Nn]\ .*/ AND process.command_line:/.*\ \-[Vv][Aa][Ll][Uu][Ee]\ 0\ .*/) OR (process.command_line:/.*\ \-[Nn][Aa][Mm][Ee]\ [Dd][Ee][Pp][Oo][Ff][Ff]\ .*/ AND process.command_line:/.*\ \-[Vv][Aa][Ll][Uu][Ee]\ 1\ .*/) OR (process.command_line:/.*\ \-[Nn][Aa][Mm][Ee]\ [Dd][Ii][Ss][Aa][Bb][Ll][Ee][Ff][Ii][Rr][Ss][Tt][Rr][Uu][Nn][Cc][Uu][Ss][Tt][Oo][Mm][Ii][Zz][Ee]\ .*/ AND process.command_line:/.*\ \-[Vv][Aa][Ll][Uu][Ee]\ 2\ .*/))
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`((process.command_line:*\ \-name\ IEHarden\ * AND process.command_line:*\ \-value\ 0\ *) OR (process.command_line:*\ \-name\ DEPOff\ * AND process.command_line:*\ \-value\ 1\ *) OR (process.command_line:*\ \-name\ DisableFirstRunCustomize\ * AND process.command_line:*\ \-value\ 2\ *))`
